sense.def:
An exception
je stvar, oseba ali položaj, ki ne sodi v splošno trditev.

seg.quote: Women, with a few exceptions, are not involved in politics.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
without exception
povemo, da je naša trditev resnična v vseh primerih.

seg.quote: Almost without exception, the fastest-growing cities are in Africa.

sense.def:
To take exception to something
pomeni, da nas nekaj žali ali jezi.

seg.quote: There are three things you've just said that I take exception to.
